title: Dementia Resources Updates
description: Listen to Dementia Resources Updates, a playlist curated by Public Health Scotland on desktop and mobile.
cleaned_text: Dementia Resources Updates [Public Health Scotland](/nhs-health-scotland) Playlist 2:22 2 Tracks May 2, 2018 Michael Tornow, NHS Health Scotland Senior Health Improvement Officer, and Nicole Nayar, Alzheimer Scotland Information Manager, speak about our suite of updated dementia resources.
